mapper.insert: insert into bb_coupons (staff_id, name, type, discount, min, resume, amount, expired_type, start_date, end_date, duration, limit_wday, limit_room) values (#{staffId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{discount}, #{min}, #{resume}, #{amount}, #{expiredType,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.EnumHandler}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{limitWday,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.WeekListTypeHandler}, #{limitRoom})
mapper.select: select * from bb_coupons where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update bb_coupons set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, discount = #{discount}, min = #{min}, resume = #{resume} where id = #{id}
